title: (LIVE) Massive protest near Presidential residence against economic crisis
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) ; People have gathered to stage a protest near the President’s residence in Pengiriwatte road in Mirihana.
Police were seen on premises attempting to curb the situation, and the people have initiated the protest against the rising cost of living, gas shortage and the fuel shortage.
Many were seen holding boards and participating in the protest.
When God gives rain and CPC gives fuel, CEB can give power: CEB Chairman
